Uses of Class
org.fluentjdbc.DbContextBulkDeleteBuilder

  • Packages that use DbContextBulkDeleteBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.fluentjdbc
    Fluent JDBC is a micro ORM - a library to help you generate and execute SQL statements with JDBC.

    • Uses of DbContextBulkDeleteBuilder in org.fluentjdbc

      Methods in org.fluentjdbc that return DbContextBulkDeleteBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      <T> DbContextBulkDeleteBuilder<T> DbContextTable.bulkDelete​(Iterable<T> objects)
      Creates a DbContextBulkDeleteBuilder object to fluently generate a DELETE ... statement for a list of objects.
      <T> DbContextBulkDeleteBuilder<T> DbContextTable.bulkDelete​(Stream<T> objects)
      Creates a DbContextBulkDeleteBuilder object to fluently generate a DELETE ... statement for a list of objects.
      DbContextBulkDeleteBuilder<T> DbContextBulkDeleteBuilder.where​(String field, Function<T,​?> value)
      Adds a function that will be called for each object to get the value for PreparedStatement.setObject(int, Object) for each row in the bulk update to extract the values for the WHERE fieldName = ? clause
